content: बीभत्स {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बध् स्वार्थे सन्] {@--1@} Disgusting, loathsome, nauseous, hideous, revolting; हंत बीभत्समेवाग्रे वर्तते <ls>Māl. 5</ls> ‘Oh! it is indeed a loathsome sight’. {@--2@} Envious, malignant, mischievous. {@--3@} Savage, cruel, ferocious. {@--4@} Estranged in mind. {@--5@} Loathing, detesting. {@--6@} Sinful, wicked. --त्सः {@--1@} Disgust, abhorrence, detestation. {@--2@} The disgusting sentiment, one of the 8 or {9} {%rasas%} in poetry; जुगुप्सास्थायिभावस्तु बीभत्सः कथ्यते रसः <ls>S. D. 236</ls> ({%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} <ls>Māl. 5. 16.</ls>). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Arjuna.
